getHelp.name: call-helper
getHelp.subtitle: Coping with a Crisis
getHelp.description: What happened to you? Whatever it is, we're here to listen, to care, and to help- with out Resource & Crisis Helpline/Text/Chat, crisis intervention services, legal clinics, and more.

getHelp.name: visit-helper
getHelp.subtitle: Finding a Safe Place
getHelp.description: Where can you go? We provide 24-hour assistance to people in crisis, including safe shelters and residential treatment programs for both youth and adults.

getHelp.name: groups-helpers
getHelp.subtitle: Getting Continued Support
getHelp.description: How can you move from crisis to hope? We offer counseling and specialized support groups for parents, victims of crime, and those who have lost someone to suicide or homicide.
